articles.author: Simone McCarthy, Nectar Gan
articles.title: China mourns Kissinger — ‘a most valued old friend’ - CNN
articles.description: The death of Henry Kissinger on Wednesday saw the loss of a diplomat Beijing has long considered a trusted friend, with China’s Foreign Ministry on Thursday hailing the former American secretary of state as “a pioneer and architect of China-US relations” for …
articles.content:
Editors Note: Sign up for CNNs Meanwhile in China newsletter, which explores what you need to know about the countrys rise and how it impacts the world.
